context.rdfs:comment:
An article, such as a news article or piece of investigative report. Newspapers and magazines have articles of many different types and this is intended to cover them all.

See also blog post.
context.rdfs:label: Article

properties.rdfs:comment: Articles may belong to one or more 'sections' in a magazine or newspaper, such as Sports, Lifestyle, etc.
properties.rdfs:label: articleSection

properties.rdfs:comment: The actual body of the article.
properties.rdfs:label: articleBody

properties.rdfs:comment: The number of words in the text of the Article.
properties.rdfs:label: wordCount
